H0.text: Structure is the type of system to which the engine of an automobile belongs.

H1.text: Propulsion is the type of system that the engine of an automobile belongs to.

H2.text: Guidance is the type of system that the engine of an automobile is part of.

H3.text: Control is the type of system that the engine of an automobile is part of.

A4.text: An aircraft propulsion system generally consists of an aircraft engine and some means to generate thrust, such as a propeller or a propulsive nozzle.

A5.text: A technological system uses an engine or motor as the power source (commonly called a powerplant), and wheels and axles, propellers, or a propulsive nozzle to generate the force.
